speakerBioSummary.text:
• Shin Lim, known as the Mozart of Magic, is a World FISM (Magic Olympics) Champion for Close-up Card Magic. 
  • He is also the only 2-time AGT(America Got Talent ) winner voted by the American audience.
  • Shin performs carefully choreographed musical, magical Card "ballet" routines combining dexterity, precision, and grace.
  • He has showcased his magical acts worldwide on stages from Australia, Macau - The Vegas of Asia, Europe, and now in Vegas at the MGM Mirage Theater headlining his own show called "Limitless."

speakerBiography.text:
Shin Lim, known as the Mozart of Magic, is a World FISM (Magic Olympics) Champion for Close-up Card Magic and the only 2-time America's Got Talent (AGT) winner voted by the American audience.

Shin performs carefully choreographed musical, magical Card "ballet" routines.

Combining dexterity, precision, and grace, he has showcased his magical acts worldwide on stages from Australia, Macau-The Vegas of Asia, Europe, and now in Vegas at the MGM Mirage Theater headlining his own show called "Limitless."

speakerNameSubheading.text: Award-Winning Performer and Choreographer of Musical, Magical Routines
